page.title: 14Shops.
page.content:
Shops in Beckington include:-
{Post Office}- sells confectionary and novelties.
{Village Stores}- small supermarket
{Cane Shop}- where furniture is made and some other craft work.
{Furniture Restorer}- sells antiques, hand knitted woolens and jewelery.
{Natural History Bookshop }- mainly deals with the trade.
{Military Book Shop}- this was also a printing press but the owner has moved to Chippenham and runs the printing side of the business from there. The shop in Beckington is open once of twice a week.
